entries.title: Core Memory
entries.content:
# Agent Core Memory

## Identity
- Name: OpenClaw Agent
- Role: Personal AI agent and assistant

## Key Projects
- NLA App (port 3000) — primary web application
- OpenClaw Agent Dashboard (port 3100) — this dashboard

## Preferences
- Dark mode only
- Purple/indigo accent colors
- TypeScript over JavaScript
- Bun as package manager (when available)

## Patterns
- Always check existing patterns before suggesting new ones
- Prefer editing files over creating new ones
- Keep solutions minimal and focused

## Important Files
- `/data/activity.jsonl` — activity log
- `/data/status.json` — system status
- `/data/daily/YYYY-MM-DD.json` — daily summaries

entries.title: Code Patterns
entries.content:
# Code Patterns

## Next.js 15
- Use App Router (not Pages Router)
- Tailwind v4 — no tailwind.config.js needed
- shadcn/ui for components

## TypeScript
- Define interfaces in `/types/index.ts`
- Use strict mode
- Prefer `type` for unions, `interface` for objects

## API Routes
- Use `route.ts` in `app/api/` directories
- Return `NextResponse.json()`
- Handle errors with try/catch

## Data Layer
- Read from `/data/` directory
- JSONL for append-only logs
- JSON for structured data

entries.title: Debugging Notes
entries.content:
# Debugging Notes

## npm Cache Issues
- If npm EACCES errors: set cache to `/tmp/npm-cache`
- `npm config set cache /tmp/npm-cache`

## Next.js Issues
- Tailwind v4 doesn't need `tailwind.config.js`
- shadcn components auto-import from `@/components/ui/`

## Port Conflicts
- Port 3000: NLA app
- Port 3100: OpenClaw Agent Dashboard
- Always specify port explicitly

entries.title: Agent Roster
entries.content:
# Agent Roster

## Active Agents
- **Hex** — Primary engineer, code/debug/architect
- **Scout** — Code reviewer, PR analysis
- **Scribe** — Writer, docs/summaries/reports
- **Sentinel** — Monitor, alerts/anomalies
- **Analyst** — Data analyst, metrics/insights
- **Ghost** — Stealth operator, background tasks

## Invocation
- Agents are spawned via Task tool in Claude Code
- Each has specific capabilities and prompts
- Track usage in `/data/agents.json`

entries.title: Context Buffer
entries.content:
# Context Buffer Status

## Current Session
- Session started: 2026-02-18T17:00:00Z
- Messages in context: 24
- Estimated tokens used: ~28,400
- Remaining budget: ~96,600

## Buffer Management
- Auto-compression at 80% capacity
- Summary written to MEMORY.md on compression
- Full context archived to daily log
